sentences.en: " Bought it off'n Ben Rogers two weeks ago for a hoop - stick. "
sentences.cn: “ 两星期前用一根推铁环的棍子和贝恩-罗杰换的. ”

sentences.en: " N " is a syllabic consonant in " button " .
sentences.cn: 在 button 这个词里n是 构成音节的辅音.

sentences.en: "They play classic rock'n"roll,' states her boyfriend, "My dad digs them too."
sentences.cn: “他们演奏经典摇滚乐，”她的男朋友说道，“我爸爸也喜欢他们。”

sentences.en: He began living out his rock "n" roll fantasy during his last year in law school.
sentences.cn: 在法学院的最后一年，他开始着手实践自己的摇滚梦想。

sentences.en: It rapidly became apparent that rock'n'roll was a very broad church indeed.
sentences.cn: 摇滚乐实际无所不包，这一点很快就显而易见了。

sentences.en: It was so dark that we could n't see a wink.
sentences.cn: 天色那么黑以致我一点也看不见.

sentences.en: M is twice as large as N.
M precedes N in the alphabet.
Now, Hawkins, you do me justice with the cap'n.
sentences.cn: 霍金斯, 你在船主面前得为我说句公道话.

sentences.en: Rock'n'roll has become so commercialised and safe since punk.
sentences.cn: 摇滚乐自从朋克乐以后就已经过于商业化而缺乏新意了。

sentences.en: Rock'n'roll has become so commercialized and safe since punk.
sentences.cn: 自朋克乐之后，摇滚乐已经变得太商业化、太保守了。

sentences.en: She's sailed with England, the great Cap'n England, the pirate.
sentences.cn: 它曾和英格兰一起出海航行, 也就是大海盗英格兰船长.

sentences.en: The immediate ancestor of rock "n" roll is rhythm-and-blues.
sentences.cn: 摇滚乐直接源自节奏布鲁斯。

sentences.en: The N pole and S pole of two magnets will attract each other.
sentences.cn: 两个磁体的N极和S极互相吸引.

sentences.en: What they were really good at was full-on rock'n'roll.
sentences.cn: 他们真正擅长的是纯粹的摇滚乐。

sentences.en: Who forced my hand, as was the lawful cap'n?
sentences.cn: 是谁在逼迫我这合法的船长 呢 ?

phrases.tran_cn: abbr. （拉）注意（nota bene）；英国北部（North Britain）；新不伦瑞克市（New Brunswick）

trans.tran_cn: 英语字母表的第14个字母
trans.tran_en: N is the fourteenth letter of the English alphabet
